review.review_reply: Thanks Annabelle for your review!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

review.comment: I purchased a massage gift card for my mother. It was during the pandemic but I thought it would be honored considering most people did not leave their homes but they did not.  This is absolutely RIDICULOUS! I paid $100. Do NOT buy a gift card from this place!
review.review_reply: Hi Stacy, thanks for your review.  I realize this is frustrating; this pandemic has been difficult for all of us, being a small business owner during this pandemic has definitely come with its share of trials and unexpected events.  I recently took over LKN Salt Spa and all gift certificates sold under previous ownership had a 1 year expiration date on them, if you have your certificate and it doesn’t show that please bring it in so I can take a look at it.  My records show the gift card you purchased for $89.00 is over 7 months past its expiration date, if this is incorrect and you show otherwise please let me know.  Your mom was also offered her choice of a halotherapy or Infrared bed session on us, which she declined, and the late cancellation fee was also compensated.  Going forward I will work with my staff to gather more information on gift card balances when booking the appointment to avoid this in the future.  I appreciate you brining this to my attention and thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. ~Nina

review.comment: I suffer sever asthma and allergies.  I started reading about salt therapy and decided it was worth a try.   I have been blown away with the results.  I have come in completely stuffed up and whizzing.  After a 25 min halo session and a 25 min detox session I walk away breathing easier and feeling great.   The staff has been great to work with on scheduling even for a last min appointment.
review.review_reply: Thank You Teresa for the Review!  We are so glad you have responded so quickly & so well.. nothing is more annoying than having stopped up sinuses and difficulty breathing, of course we are not surprised! But we do love to hear about it!  We look forward to seeing you soon!

review.comment: Fantastic  facility, nice and inviting. Highly recommended! Thanks
review.review_reply: Thanks for the review Jonathan!  We are thrilled you enjoyed your experience with us and hope to see you again soon!

review.comment:
I love this experience. Grounding, relaxing, wonderful!
So soothing and peaceful to lay back in a zero gravity chair and just breathe!
Take time for yourself to experience the salt and detoxify!
review.review_reply: Thanks Karen! So happy you enjoyed your experience with us..... see you again soon!  Thanks for always brining in your friends.

review.comment: So relaxing!!!!😍 Such a great and wonderful experience!!! The lady at the front was so nice and had alot of knowledge about the place😁 I've been before and took my husband back for the first time and he fell in love with it!!!😍 So he said this has to go in our schedule from now on at least twice a week due to where we live and it's about 2 hours away from this place😳!!! If it wasn't for that trust this would be a weekly thing😁💯
review.review_reply: Thank You For The Awesome Review Donna!  We Are So Glad To Hear You Both Enjoyed Your Visit! Look Forward To Seeing You Again!

review.comment: Great experience!!
review.review_reply: Thank You Danielle! It was great meeting you...

review.comment: Loved the experience. Try the sole water while you're there.
review.review_reply: Thank You For the Review Fran!!!

review.comment: This was such a good experience and I will definitely be back! It’s a clean, relaxing environment and the staff is great! I highly recommend the salt room & infrared bed!
review.review_reply: Thanks for your awesome review. We love testimonials like this!!!  So glad you had an amazing time!

review.comment: I had Halotherapy, Infrared session and an hour massage.  It was fantastic!  The staff were very accommodating and procedures are in place for everyone's safety.  I can't wait to go back.
review.review_reply: Thank You Lisa for your review...we are so glad you enjoyed yourself!  Take care &  We Look forward to seeing you very soon!

review.comment: Very calming and inviting when you first come in. I choose to do the salt room, and an inferred treatment of the recommendation of a friend. Very lovely set up. Was a great detox of my mind, and body.
review.review_reply: Great to meet you today CJ...so glad you enjoyed your experience today..look forward to seeing you again soon!

review.comment: Very clean place. Loved the infrared salt therapy and deep tissue massage with Kelly.
review.review_reply: Thank you Alice !  We are so glad you enjoyed your services Saturday...it was nice to meet you, hope to see you again very soon...
Thanks for 5 stars @chris.   We love that you gave us such a high review!!!

review.comment: I am a pure fan. I have been coming here since their opening. As always I leave refreshed and relaxed. I needed my sessions today. With all the angst in the world today everyone needs a release. My mind is clearer. My body feels better. I will be back soon. Thank you all for being so kind and courteous. Truly one of my favorite spots.
review.review_reply: @saula thanks for an incredible review.  We have loved seeing you at all your sessions and can’t wait to see you again!

review.comment: Absolutely fell in love with Lake Norman salt spa today! We’ve dome halotherapy for years but with Covid and the stay in place we thought everything healthy for us was closed. Thank you for keeping us healthy . Went ahead and did the rewards to keep us coming
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Marcia!  Its been amazing getting to know you & your sweet daughter! We are so glad we have been available to provide our amazing healing benefits to clients like you!

review.comment: I used to really love this place, but randomly with no notice the owner changed the policy for children's Halotherapy and it makes sense, to not disrupt massages, however, the hours set for children appointments is in the middle of the day, so if you work a normal 8-5 you will not be able to come. Additionally. they randomly started charging $10 for any additional child after the fist. We have been coming here for over two years and have never had a problem, but will not return once I finish my package. Make sure you ask good questions prior to purchasing any packages.
Such a relaxing experience. I will definitely come back!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much, we are so glad you enjoyed your experience!

review.comment: Fantastic experience! Kelly did a salt stone massage and it was super relaxing! Great place! I will definitely be back!
review.review_reply: We are so glad you enjoyed your experience today, Kelly does an amazing job we are so lucky to have her working here!

review.comment: Amazing spa, complete relaxation !  Kelly is the best, highly recommend her for your massage!!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review...we agree she is amazing!  Please come back!

review.comment: This was a great experience!  Felt relaxed and able to breath clearly after!
review.review_reply: So glad you enjoyed yourself Robin! Its amazing how fast the salt therapy "Halotherapy" works.  Hope to see you again soon!

review.comment: Always the Best Place to Relax, alone or with family and friends. The Halo Room allows you to experience the effects of the Himalayan Pink Salt; the Infrared room gives you vibes like being on the sand Warmth like in the Sun, plus the Sounds of the Ocean. You'll love it! And if you do, there are packages,  You can also buy many things, Salt Lamps, Salt scrub, etc. The Staff are Extra Friendly and Helpful...
review.review_reply: Thank You Suzanne! We enjoy seeing you when you visit...so glad you enjoy the infrared & halo. Look forward to seeing you soon!
Thank you for the 5* Becky!  Nice to meet you hope to see you again soon!!

review.comment: Really enjoyed the atmosphere and the staff was super sweet. I was overwhelmed by the salt a little bit and I didnt care for how I was covered in salt dust.  My hair, clothes, everything! My son enjoyed playing and it definitely cleared our sinuses.  So all in all, we really liked it.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review!  It does get "salty" we can always give you an extra blanket or you can arrive a little early and change into something to wear into the room!  Glad you felt the relief from the salt...Hope to see you soon!

review.comment: So much fun in the halotherapy room
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review! Glad you enjoyed yourself!
Thanks for the 5* review...Hope to see you again soon!

review.comment: Absolutely amazing! Relaxed, refreshed, rejuvenated, and will most definitely book another appointment!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your  5 star review!  We are very pleased you had an amazing experience, we strive to make everyone feel relaxed and leave feeling better than when they arrived!  Look forward to seeing you again!

review.comment: Fantastic experience! Professional, educating, and extremely relaxing. I am excited to add regular visits at Lake Norman Salt Spa to my regimen of self care!
review.review_reply: Thank you Allie! We are so very glad you enjoyed your services & are putting yourself at the top of the list!!!  Looking forward to seeing you again very soon.

review.comment: Such a neat place! My daughter loved playing in the salt during our halo halotherapy session. I highly recommend this place.
review.review_reply: Lindsay, It was so nice to meet both of you today...Look forward to seeing you both again soon!  Hope the allergies are on their way out !

review.comment: Great infrared session! It’s my first time visiting this location!
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for coming in! Can't wait for you to try out our halotherapy.

review.comment: Kiara was amazing. I get massages everywhere and have for years. This was one of the best by far. 🙏❤
review.review_reply: We're so glad you enjoyed your massage and will pass this along to Kiara!

review.comment: Diane is truly amazing person.. check out Halo therapy in Lake Norman/ Charlott NC my Pneumonia brought me to Heal although it is soooo much more✅this is for everyone who wants to feel better in general 🔮
review.review_reply: It was great meeting you and Tim, so glad you both enjoyed your sessions and felt better.  It is amazing what halotherapy can really do in just 50 minutes! Hope you continue to heal.  Blessings

review.comment: We came for halo therapy due to my pneumonia lingering what we got was an amazing experience and an education from DIANE who is a true asset to this company after spending 90 minutes in the salt room truly and breathing better feel better it’s a must stop if you’re near Lake Norman / Charlotte North Carolina🔮
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind review.  We are blessed with clients like yourself, and are very glad when they feel the benefits of the salt therapy so fast! Hope you are doing better. Blessings LKN Salt Spa

review.comment: Loved the Halotherapy! I had heard of the benefits of Himalayan salt therapy, but have never experienced it before. By the end of the session, I felt so relaxed could feel the tension melting out of my face and body. The receptionist is very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. I have a salt stone massage scheduled for next week and I can’t wait!
review.review_reply: Thanks for coming by and we're so happy you enjoyed it! See you next week!!

review.comment:
This place is amazing and really makes a difference in my asthma and MS
I have tried several and keep coming back to this one. It’s by far the best.
review.review_reply: Tonia. We love this review and thanks for sharing the benefits of salt therapy. We hope to see you again soon. Don’t forget we offer unlimited Halotherapy memberships!!
Thanks for the review! Come back and see us!

review.comment: Relaxing, nice ambiance.
review.review_reply: Thanks for coming in!
Thank you for your review!
Thank you for your review!

review.comment: Amazing, relaxing and healing. I highly recommend you try it, you will love it.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! Come back and see us!

review.comment: Could not pass up a chance on saying a very good review. The place is peaceful,  clean, and full of positive energy.  They must have been wondering why I smiled through the whole experience.  Kelly was amazing! She truly took me on a vacation while I was on vacation lol! Prices were reasonable. I would definitely come back again.
review.review_reply: Kerri-Ann thanks for your kind review. We enjoyed having you and yes - Kelly’s healing sessions are out of this world. See you soon!!

review.comment:
Omg, i had such an Amazing time today I got a chance to meet Kelly and she is Phenomenal with the Yoga Awesome time to just relax and enjoy a Girls Time with
Himalayan Salt ... Please Please Visit soon you wont be disappointed 😍😍
review.review_reply: We love this - thanks for the review and we hope to see you all again.  If your new to Halotherapy (salt therapy) call us at 704-997-5890 we always have new client and returning client specials

review.comment: Awesome place very relaxing!
review.review_reply: Thanks Vino - our salt rooms were built with intention of healing relaxation!  Glad you experienced it!!

review.comment: So nice and relaxing! Great time!
review.review_reply: You ladies were awesome. Hope to see you again soon!

review.comment: Amazing..Simply Amazing!
review.review_reply: Very nice meeting all of you today, hope you enjoyed spending your birthday here!

review.comment: Had a great time with the girls and it was very relaxing!
review.review_reply: So glad you had a great time...you ladies were awesome

review.comment: Very relaxing environment.   Everyone is friendly and knowledgeable.  Enjoyed the experience!
review.review_reply: Monica. Thanks for the review. We enjoyed having you!!!
